title: Ep. 1040 - Woke Med Students Disavow Science, Biology, and Modern Medicine
description:
Click here to join the member exclusive portion of my show: https://utm.io/ueSEm  

Today on the Matt Walsh Show, med students participate in a bizarre incantation ritual where they pledge to reject the gender binary and show respect for primitive medical practices. This is what modern medicine has become. Speaking of modern medicine, Canada has expanded their euthanasia laws so that now physically healthy young people, even minors, can be victims of doctor assisted suicide. Plus, the unedited portions of Kanye’s interview with Tucker Carlson are leaked online. The Left is calling it a bombshell scoop, we’ll see if they’re overreacting again. And even MSNBC is now admitting that John Fetterman is mentally incompetent. But he’s not dropping out of the race.

- - -
